name: Setup of roles
author: Eugene Yudin

sections.description: By means of a plugin “Setup of roles” you can easily add/delete the user roles, except a role “Administrator”, and quickly set up capabilities of each of them according to the needs.
sections.installation:
1. Extract “setup_of-roles.zip” archive content to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Change your WordPress standard roles capabilities according to your needs through the ‘Options’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
• Whether it is possible to rename a role? No, so far such opportunity isn’t present.

  • Whether copying of roles is possible? This opportunity will be provided in upcoming versions of a plugin.
sections.changelog:
0.0.1

  • 04.12.2014
  • Adding/deleting roles, except a role “Administrator”.
  • Change of capabilities for each role, except a role “Administrator”.

short_description: "Setup of roles" very simple plug-in for setup of roles and capabilities of users.
description: By means of a plugin “Setup of roles” you can easily add/delete the user roles, except a role “Administrator”, and quickly set up capabilities of each of them according to the needs.
